allow: Bash(do sed -i 's/package de\\.mephisto\\.vpin\\.restclient\\.backups/package de.mephisto.vpin.restclient.vpxmobile/g; s/import de\\.mephisto\\.vpin\\.restclient\\.backups/import de.mephisto.vpin.restclient.vpxmobile/g; s/BackupDescriptorRepresentation/VPXMobileDescriptorRepresentation/g; s/BackupSourceRepresentation/VPXMobileSourceRepresentation/g; s/BackupFileInfoFactory/VPXMobileFileInfoFactory/g; s/BackupFileInfo/VPXMobileFileInfo/g; s/BackupPackageInfo/VPXMobilePackageInfo/g; s/BackupServiceClient/VPXMobileServiceClient/g; s/BackupSourceType/VPXMobileSourceType/g; s/BackupMameData/VPXMobileMameData/g; s/BackupDataStudio/VPXMobileDataStudio/g; s/StudioBackupDescriptor/StudioVPXMobileDescriptor/g; s/BackupType/VPXMobileType/g' "$f")
